alert.note: Alert for Hawaii in Hawaii (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 09 at 4:40AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM HST THIS MORNING FOR THE ISLAND OF HAWAII IN HAWAII COUNTY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...The island of Hawaii in Hawaii County. * WHEN...Until 745 AM HST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding on roads, poor drainage areas, and in streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 438 AM HST, radar indicated heavy rain over Puna district. Rain was falling at a rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hawaiian Paradise Park, Pahoa, Hawaiian Acres, Orchidlands Estates, Keaau, Glenwood, Mountain View, Volcano, Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, Ainaloa, Fern Acres, Leilani Estates, Eden Roc, Nanawale Estates, Kalapana, Hawaiian Beaches, Fern Forest, Kurtistown and Isaac Hale Beach Park. This advisory may need to be extended beyond 745 AM HST if flooding persists.
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, drainage ditches and low lying areas prone to flooding.
